titles.title: A resolution commending Alfonso E. Lenhardt for his service to the United States Senate.
A resolution commending Alfonso E. Lenhardt for his service to the United States Senate.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Star Print ordered on the resolution.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the Senate on March 18, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Commends the extraordinary contributions of Alfonso C. Lenhardt to the Senate and the country through his service as the 36th Sergeant at Arms and Doorkeeper for the U.S. Senate.
